Motion Design

Honest Food

The Honest Food campaign, initiated by IFOAM - Organics International in 2019, is a communication campaign with the aim to get the world to eat more sustainably. This short explainer video introduces the campaign and the various tools that are available in the campaign.

Role: Concept, Design, Animation

Software Used: After Effects, Premiere Pro, Photoshop, Illustrator
